name: sb-button
description: Button's outer wrapper or the <share-button> class

name: sb-<button-name>
description: A class added to the button according to the type, e.g. 'sb-facebook'

name: sb-show-icon
description: Indicates that the buttons has icon

name: sb-show-text
description: Indicates that the buttons has text

name: sb-show-count
description: Indicates that the buttons has count

name: sb-content
description: 'sb-inner' child, the wrapper the holds 'sb-icon' and 'sb-text'
